Games

Welcome to my games!

These are all games I wrote in ProcessingJS on Khan Academy in 2017/18. You can see all my projects here.

Paint 2.0

Press any key and move the mouse to draw,
press alt and click a saved color to overwrite it,
pressing alt also ends the shape when using the dot connect tool

Helix Roll

Use the left and right arrow keys to fall through the green holes.
Move quickly to increase your multiplier, watch out for the red tiles, they steal points

Ball Fight

Ball Fight is a 2-player game.
Use the arrow keys and WASD to controll the balls and fight.
Hold shift to select a ball and weapon for player 1.

Cannon

Click to fire cannonballs.
Time it right and hit all the ships.
See the rest here
